page.title: 05A Day At School
page.content: After I have made packed lunches for my sister and myself we walk to school. When I arrive, I play out in the play- ground until the bell goes. Then we all go to our lines. When we go inside the teacher does the register, then we go to assembly in the hall. The headmaster says "Good morning everyone" and then he tells us a story, after which we sing a song.The one I like best is "Colours of Day". After that he talks to us and then we go back to our class- room. When we get back we do maths. At the moment we are doing averages, which are quite hard. At l0.40a.m. we go out to play. After play we do social studies or English. Sometimes we have a T.V.programme. At ll.55 the bell goes for dinnertime. For dinner I have sand- wiches, a taxi biscuit, a bag of crisps and a drink. We do more lessons in the afternoon and go home at 3.30p.m.
